block_comment: This block regulates column command enable signal and sent column command signals within a memory controller design. The assigned action is triggered by either 'sent_col_lcl' or 'sent_col_lcl_r' signal change. The 'cs_en0' and 'send_cmd0_col' are assigned the value of 'sent_col_lcl_r', whereas 'send_cmd3_col' is assigned the value of 'sent_col_lcl'.
